translation.main_subtitle: Experience the exquisite quality of our transport service where our commitment ensures that your journey is much more than just a ride thanks to our private drivers who are available to you 24/7.
translation.step1: Provide correct information about your journey
translation.step2: Wait for our call to confirm your booking with the provided information
translation.about_title: Enhance your travel experience with TaxiParis
translation.about_text: We are a team of dedicated private hire drivers committed to ensuring a safe and comfortable journey in Paris. Trust us for premium transport service and exceptional customer experience.
translation.service1: Benefit from competitive private hire rates that can be adjusted based on traffic and duration, ensuring you the best deal no matter the conditions.
translation.service2: To allow you to travel without stress or rush, Airport or other pickups include free waiting time.
translation.service3: Whether it's airport transfers, business trips, sightseeing, emergencies, or express delivery, enjoy our comprehensive range of services.
translation.our_prices: Enjoy our advantageous prices
translation.estimate_text: Please note that prices may vary depending on weather, time, destination, and traffic. Thank you for your understanding.
translation.booking_text: Please provide accurate information so we can consider your request.
translation.read_and_accept: I have read and accept the information
translation.footer_text: A new company whose sole aim is to meet the needs of our clients. We strive to ensure a perfect transfer. Don't hesitate to book a private driver now.
translation.services_text: Tailor-made services combining comfort, safety, and punctuality.
translation.regular_transport_text: Simplify your regular commutes with us. Whether it's for commuting to work, frequent travels, or recurring appointments, we offer a convenient and reliable solution for your daily transportation needs.
translation.airport_transfer_text: Travel stress-free to and from the airport. Our punctual drivers will be waiting for you upon arrival to greet you and safely drive you to your destination. No more worries about delays or transportation complications, we take care of everything.
translation.delivery_text: Need to send or retrieve a parcel urgently? Our team is here to meet your most pressing needs. Whether it's important documents, fragile packages, or valuable items, trust us to deliver them to their destination.
translation.business_tranfer_text: Whether you have important meetings, client visits, or conferences to attend, we offer a reliable and efficient transportation solution. Our experienced drivers are at your service to take you where you need to go, on time and in comfort.
translation.tour_text: Whether you want to explore historical sites, lively neighborhoods, or popular restaurants, we'll take you wherever you want to go. Our team knows every corner of the city and is ready to offer you an immersive and memorable experience at your own pace.
translation.special_events_text: We would be delighted to accompany you to weddings, parties, or any other special event, ensuring your transportation from the beginning to the end of the celebration.
